### @function spacing Returns set spacing or calculate current spacing when inside breakpoint Accepts a value of 0.5, 1 or 2. If used in @include breakpoint it uses that current gutter. Also possible to define which 'size' it should use. #### SCSS {% highlight css %} @include breakpoint($charlie) { padding-top: spacing(); } {% endhighlight %} #### CSS {% highlight css %} @media screen and (min-width: 560px) { .foo { padding-top: 24px; } } {% endhighlight %}
